title: Black Ubuntu for Android V7 (Note3 working)
description:
BlackUbuntu 12.04 V7:

When you start BlackUbuntu: 
RUN Linux on android and edit where you unzip the files for the img
after starting:

 Y to check md5
Check cancel on startup system error, minor bug.

Screen shots and help installing: http://d-h.st/2tN

This should only have to be done once to set up your device to BlackUbuntu.
